VERIFICATION REPORT: vcs version 3

Bureau Veritas Certification verified the information reported in the VCS-PD version 02 dated 20/08/2012"! against the CDM-PDD “, CDM validation report ®!, Project Host country (China) LOA", Project Operation Log "*!, Business License "°! and UNFCCC website ”°! and found consistent. The detailed validation process is documented in the Table below

Ref

.CRITERIA OF VCS-PD COMMENTS 1. Project Details | | | 1.2 Sectoral Scope and Project VCS-PD, As a wind power farm the Project falls into Type CDM-PDD, the sectoral scope | (renewable source). CDM OK Validation Report 1.3 Project Proponent VCS-PD, The Project owner is Chifeng Xinsheng CDM-PDD, Wind Power Co., Ltd. CDM Validation Report, OK LOA, UNFCCC website, PPA 1.5 Project Start Date The project starting date in VCS Version 3 is defined as the date when the Project VCS-PD, | began generating GHG emission reduction Project or removals. commercial operation | As per implementation log of the Project, on OK Grid 02/12/2008 the Project commenced to company | deliever electricity to the grid. As a certificate | consequence the Project starting date is 02/12/2008. 1.6 Project Crediting Period VCS-PD, The Project starting date is 02/12/2008 and and Project the Project was registered as CDM on F 28/07/2010. commercial operation Consequently the VCS crediting period is Grid | from 02/12/2008-27/07/2010. ok company certificate, CD- PDD, CDM Validation
